product_name: Royal Robbins Kaden Jacket - Men's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Whether you're visiting ancient ruins or a brand new city, the Royal Robbins Kaden Jacket earns a spot in your suitcase with its combination of casual style and waterproof breathable protection. A windproof, waterproof and breathable membrane is laminated between the wool/polyester shell fabric and the stretch polyester microfleece lining. Durable water repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off, fending off light rain showers and snow. Royal Robbins Kaden jacket features a 2-way front zipper for adjustable fit and ventilation plus zippered hand pockets and a zippered chest pocket. Seams are not sealed. Closeout.
short_description: Whether you're visiting ancient ruins or a brand new city, the Royal Robbins Kaden Jacket earns a spot in your suitcase with its combination of casual style and waterproof breathable protection.
